hymn.title: Let me come closer to Thee, Lord Jesus

layout.singingstanza: Let me come clos -- er to Thee, Lord Je -- sus, Oh, clos -- er day by day; Let me lean hard -- er on Thee, Lord Je -- sus, Yes, hard -- er, all the way.

lyrics.stanza: Let me come closer to Thee, Lord Jesus, Oh, closer day by day; Let me lean harder on Thee, Lord Jesus, Yes, harder, all the way.
Let me show forth Thy beauty, Lord Jesus, Like sunshine on the hills; Oh, let my lips pour forth all Thy sweetness In joyous sparkling rills.
Yes, like a channel, precious Lord Jesus, Make me and let me be; Keep me and use me daily, Lord Jesus, For Thee, for only Thee.
In all my heart and will, O Lord Jesus, Be altogether king; Make me a loyal subject, Lord Jesus, To Thee in everything.
Thirsting and hungering for Thee, Lord Jesus, With blessed hunger here. Longing for New Jerusalem's fullness— No thirst, no hunger there.
